banner.title: Looking for a development partner?
banner.explanation: To build successful software you need a development team who understands your business needs. Our experts will identify a custom solution to fit your idea, timeline, and budget, then design and build the application and help you test it with real users. As a result, you will gain a modern digital product loved by users that benefits your business.

content2.title: Digital Strategy
content2.explanation: If you decide to work on your next app with the help of an external software development company, then your success or failure depends on finding the right partner. With this in mind, and based on our own many and varied experiences at Genixo, this article outlines the key criteria – what to look for and what to avoid – for selecting your software development company: a future partner that will help you to build great software and solve your business challenges. But how to find such a trustworthy, reliable and efficient collaborator?
content2.text: How to choose a software development company?

web.webApplicationDescription: Genixo is a passionate web development company which is able to deliver complex projects outside of the bonds of the common website building.
web.appDescription: With Genixo, your visions and ideas become a high quality product. According to your needs, even a challenging web application can be implemented in an organized manner. In the light of the provided solutions and the development, your projects become success, your vision becomes envisioned.
web.cloudDescription: Genixo provides user centered and to-the-point UI/UX designs. By using these industry-leading ideas, your vision becomes clear, and your audience grows enthusiasm.
web.optimizationDescription: Regardless of your projects integration requirements, Genixo provides a full third party support of web presences or apps. In addition to this, our methodology bounds us so that a comprehensive, bug-free and stable application is successfully developed.

cloud.nativeDescription: We determine which services and to what intensity you are going to use clıud options for your product, and we build your product from scratch on the cloud.
cloud.hibritDescription: Cloud engineers combine public clouds, private clouds, and on-premises resources to achieve the agility required for a competitive advantage.
cloud.migrationDescription: Genixo migrate your dara from on-premises infrastructure to the cloud, ensuring its security.
cloud.sassDescription: Experts work with SaaS, PaaS, and IaaS, each of which allows you to save on equipment and protect your confidential information from hacking and stealing.
cloud.re-architectingDescription: We are improving or re-developing an existing product in the Cloud according to needs.
cloud.consultingDescription: Organizing business transformation with innovative cloud applications and providing detailed advice at every stage of the transition.

custom.customApplicationDescription: Genixo’s professional team designs, creates, deploys and maintains your custom software needs for specific set of users, functions and organizations. The solutions we are offering here are constructed uniquely for your business and they can include all web, mobile and desktop applications.
custom.productDescription:
Customer Solutions!
If you want to develop a software product, let's talk about some of the benefits: # * Privacy * Customized Trackability and Management * Ease/Cost-efficiency of Integrations * Quick Adaptation * Enhanced Efficiency#
custom.enterpriseDescription: Andersen’s team of experts helps large organizations achieve long-term success by reengineering technical solutions of various complexities. This increases flexibility and business efficiency.
custom.enhancementDescription: Software engineers modernize and upgrade your software by using the latest techniques that fill the gaps in your software operations. If necessary, they create an effective software solution from scratch, which best meets your current business needs.

data.dataApplicationDescription: In 21th century, which is also called the Information Age, data became more and more priceless due to technological developments. Machines are becoming extremely “intelligent” that even scientists could not predict where this journey leads to. Data Science, “the sexiest job of the 21st century” as Harvard Business Review declared, is the combination of programming and mathematics in order to design models that are capable of extracting insights or make predictions better and quicker compared to humans. Unprocessed data makes your business inefficient. Only after the data has been processed, the right insights can be revealed and the analysis created in the light of these insights will carry your business to the peak of its potential. Because data is the most valuable thing in our age, reveal the value of the data.
data.data1Description: If there is not enough data to analyze, we could create the data pipeline if it is reachable or guide you to create a proper data acquisition system.
data.data2Description: Data sources are not reliable. So, we cleaned the data from inaccurate, outlier and noisy ones to create more accurate models.
data.data3Description: We designed mathematical or machine learning model that describes your system as well as possible.
data.data4Description: By using the model trained by your data, we could reveal the insight from your current or upcoming data stream.
data.data5Description: We could demonstrate the insight revealed by our model in a user-friendly dashboard.
data.classificationDescription: The models are trained in a way to label the data according to users' preferences. The most explanatory and cliche example of this method is spam or ham mail labeling. From the dataset, the model learns the difference between ham and spam mails and could easily label the upcoming mails accordingly.
data.regressionDescription: Basically, regression is finding the best-fit function for the dataset. By using this function, correlation in the dataset or prediction about the future could be achieved.
data.clusteringDescription: In the scenarios, where numbers of classes are not predefined as in the classification problems, the models could be trained in a way to divide the dataset. These classes would help us to understand the relation and distribution in the dataset.
data.techniquesDescription: There are mainly 3 techniques in data science;
data.techniqueusedDescription: Data Science techniques are mainly used in;

devops.devopslicationDescription: A successful DevOps model is based on four key building blocks Develop, Build and Test, Deploy, Operate and Monitor. Genixo can do it for you!
devops.marketDescription: We construct a roadmap by analyzing and virtualizing the desired state by identifying the traceable metrics.
devops.hypothesesDescription: We bridge the development operations through Continuous Deployment - Integration - Testing - Deployment.
devops.testabilityDescription: We automate the CI/CD pipeline from the beginning of coding to the production by encapsulating builds, test cases, versioning and deployment.
devops.integrationDescription: We perform end-to-end security integration through ‘Security as Code’ mechanism.

mobile.mobilelicationDescription: Mobile applications are important assets for product. It increases the platforms accessibility, visibility and self-through. By using mobile apps, users or customers functional accesses can be configured, their focus can be arranged, or the preferences can be customized to fit the user’s needs.
mobile.iosDescription: Genixo has the knowledge and skill to build user-friendly, feature-rich and reliable iOS mobile apps.
mobile.adnroidDescription: Ensure the best possible performance and UX with us. Genixo’s Android and IOS development team will help you to build scalable and professional apps across multiple android devices.
mobile.crossDescription: Genixo can also offer you cross-platform app development. With our dynamism and passion, enjoy the adjustable and top-performing applications.

solution.solutionlicationDescription: According to your ecosystem and audience, Genixo provides a ground for your projects by tailoring IT solutions.
solution.solutionlicationDescriptionGreen: We define functional requirements and implementation stages with respect to your business needs.
solution.businessDescription: Architecting for a software solution, Focuses in achieving the qualitative output as you have a blueprint of the functionalities and its requirements .Helps in planning the project lifecycle by providing general solution structure .Simplifies handling complexity as you can observe the bigger picture with it’s challenges .Advices in estimation and costing by meeting the requirements of the main stakeholder
solution.applicationDescription: The emphasis is on result-driven procedure, the focus is on intelligent and robust solutions, the priority is the material facet of solution delivery.

support.supportDescription: Benefits for your business with our tech support
support.proactiveDescription: We are making your foundation, that is, your infrastructure, stronger day by day.
support.groundUpDescription: With the help of the Genixo’s experts, whole department can be be assembled and set up for your process from scratch.
support.scalabilityDescription: Genixo professionals provide agility for your business to grow while staying flexible.
support.availabilityDescription: Genixo’s technology teams can support you 7/24. We are always up and we are always ready.
support.securityDescription: We treat the cybersecurity and data protection issues as a top priority.
support.efficiencyDescription: Genixo experts know how to keep prices under control for you.

methodology.methodology_discovery_description: The discovery phase is the first step we take when starting a process. The process is encountered, the data needs are determined. The detected data is collected.
methodology.methodology_analysis_description: Process analysis is carried out using the collected data, so that the data is meaningful.
methodology.methodology_projection_description: A process projection is designed in the light of the analyzed data.
methodology.methodology_construction_description: The designed process projection is implemented and the process is completed.
methodology.methodology_revision_description: The completed process is subject to revision first by us and then by you.
methodology.methodology_improvement_description: Improvements are made based on the determinations made after the revision.
methodology.methodology_management_description: After the revision, what has been done in the whole process is managed safely.

ngsd.name: Şeffaf Operasyon Metodolojisi
ngsd.description: Genixo New Generation Software Department - Best end-to-end software solution!
ngsd.question: For whom?
ngsd.answer: If you don't have a software team, this might be the best solution for you!
ngsd.what_is_description: Our most comprehensive 360 Degree, Dynamic, International and Remote solution that takes us and you one step further in the market. Establishing a team to meet your software needs can always be seen as the clearest solution, but as it is known, establishing a software team/department can be a very costly business. This is where Genixo NGSD comes in and saves you the trouble of setting up a team/department. The Genixo project manager assigned to your brand becomes your software manager, and Genixo becomes your software department!
ngsd.remote_description: Far but close! How? With a privileged customer experience. As Genixo, we aim to ensure that distances do not mean anything. With a transparent operation approach, we enable you to monitor processes continuously, and we take care to keep our communication at the highest level by holding scheduled meetings and providing instant customer support. With the remote software department, we increase your efficiency, and you reduce your costs.
ngsd.dynamic_description: Our job is to adapt quickly to the dynamics of your business! Together with NGSD, we are able to continuously analyze your requirements and scale up or down the team according to the status of your projects, so we are always optimally positioned for your needs.
ngsd.global_description: Let the world get smaller and, you get bigger! As the world gets smaller, nobody wants to be limited locally. We also carry this motivation, we build our projects on a vision and infrastructure that can operate globally. With our transnational vision and Genixo NGSD model, it is possible for us to implement and develop all your software requirements in a structure where you can operate globally. We invite all passionate brands who agree with us to walk this path together.

software_advisory.for_whom_description: If you have a software team, this might be the best solution for you!
software_advisory.what_is_description: It is imperative that institutions have a vision not only of the present but also of the future, and to be prepared for it, regardless of which sector they operate in. You need to make sure your team is constantly up to date and on the right track. Undoubtedly, it makes the processes of institutions more efficient if they act with a consultant in the field of software, as in many fields such as law, finance, marketing and so on. With Genixo Software Advisory, your software team works more efficiently without slowing down with professional guides.
software_advisory.architecture_description: When it comes to designing a new product or developing an existing product, a process encompasses many interconnecting steps such as needs identification, process planning, hardware strategy, infrastructure strategy, cost forecasting, mapping. It is our duty to shape your project's software strategy by being with you at every step you will take, and to make sure that the structure is set up correctly before you implement the created strategies and that we are on the right track!
software_advisory.supervision_description: We are with you throughout the whole process in order to minimize the time, effort and financial costs while implementing the designed strategies. We will be guiding you on how to overcome the problems you encounter in our periodic and instant meetings. We are with you in your decision-makings. It's our job here to make sure your productivity is high during your development.

about_us.name: Software Solution Partner & Innovation Company
about_us.Dynamism_description: Informatics is the sector with the largest trackable market share in the world, and the interesting thing is that it did not take long to reach this size. So how did this happen? With technology and therefore with innovation. Development and change are so fast that it can be difficult to follow. It is getting harder to keep up with new dynamics and to act proactively. As Genixo, our mission here is clear, and that is to stay dynamic. Genixo's vision in this regard is to always stay up-to-date and respond to the needs of the day, no matter how fast the world of informatics changes and how different the needs are. We have a corporate mentality that calculates the future by adopting a constantly pro-active attitude and can give an appropriate reaction when faced with unforeseen problems. Thus, we can stay dynamic all the time!
about_us.Passion_description: There is no devotion without passion. Without devotion, a passion will never come close to its potential and is doomed to be less successful. Being aware of this, Genixo is more than a company, it is a community of people who are aware of the fact that there is no limit to personal development, aim to develop themselves continuously, are passionate about their goals and are dedicated to achieving these goals. In line with this community consciousness built on passion and devotion, we invite ourselves and everyone we collaborate with to further their potential, to think bigger, to work more devotedly and to be more successful!
about_us.Professionalism_description: Success is achievable once you are skilled or experienced at a job. However, in order to maintain the persistence of the success achieved, a professional approach is essential, otherwise, you will definitely shorten the life of the success you have achieved. Genixo mentality always aims for persistence and sustainable success both on a personal and corporate basis by having a brand culture in which talented and experienced people work professionally. With our professional business awareness, we do not leave success to chance.

trial.read: Your data are safe with us. We take your privacy seriously and we will never share your data with anyone.
